SELECT A.OD_ID , A.OD_QTY_ID , A.PKG_PO_NO , A.DEMAND_ID , A.TOOL_NAME , A.LG_PART_NO , COALESCE(A.LG_OD_QTY,0) AS LG_OD_QTY , A.LINE , A.FINAL_VENDOR , A.CLASS , A.PART_NUMBER , A.DESC , COALESCE(A.RESULT_QTY,0) AS RESULT_QTY , A.NEO_OD_TIME , A.NEO_OD_DAY , COALESCE(A.NEO_OD_QTY,0) AS NEO_OD_QTY FROM RFID_IF_PACKING_WOSENDLIST_ODONLY A WHERE 1 = 1
ORDER A.OD_KEY ASC
ORDER BY A.OD_KEY DESC
ORDER BY A.OD_QTY_ID DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RFID_IF_PACKING_WOSENDLIST_ODONLY A WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS ROWNUM , A.FINAL_VENDOR AS CODE , A.FINAL_VENDOR AS CODE_NAME FROM RFID_IF_PACKING_WOSENDLIST_ODONLY A , (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.FINAL_VENDOR IS NOT NULL GROUP BY A.FINAL_VENDOR ORDER BY ROWNUM

SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 ROWNUM , A.TOOL_NAME CODE , A.TOOL_NAME CODE_NAME FROM RFID_IF_PACKING_WOSENDLIST_ODONLY A , (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.FINAL_VENDOR LIKE concat('%',#{codeId},'%') AND A.TOOL_NAME IS NOT NULL GROUP BY A.FINAL_VENDOR ORDER BY ROWNUM

SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 ROWNUM , A.PKG_PO_NO AS CODE , A.PKG_PO_NO CODE_NAME FROM RFID_IF_PACKING_WOSENDLIST_ODONLY A , (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.FINAL_VENDOR LIKE concat('%',#{codeId},'%') AND A.TOOL_NAME LIKE concat('%',#{sltValue},'%') AND A.PKG_PO_NO IS NOT NULL GROUP BY A.FINAL_VENDOR ORDER BY ROWNUM

SELECT A.OD_ID , A.OD_QTY_ID , A.PKG_PO_NO , A.DEMAND_ID , A.TOOL_NAME , A.LG_PART_NO , COALESCE(A.LG_OD_QTY,0) AS LG_OD_QTY , A.LINE , A.FINAL_VENDOR , A.CLASS , A.PART_NUMBER , A.DESC , COALESCE(A.RESULT_QTY,0) AS RESULT_QTY , A.NEO_OD_TIME , A.NEO_OD_DAY , COALESCE(A.NEO_OD_QTY,0) AS NEO_OD_QTY , COALESCE(A.QTY_ON_HAND,0) AS QTY_ON_HAND , COALESCE(A.PRE_QTY_ON_HAND,0) AS PRE_QTY_ON_HAND FROM RFID_IF_PACKING_WOSENDLIST_ODONLY A WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.FINAL_VENDOR LIKE concat('%',#{sRqstVendorCd},'%')
AND A.TOOL_NAME LIKE concat('%',#{sRqstItemCd},'%')
AND A.PKG_PO_NO LIKE concat('%',#{sRqstPNoCd},'%')
GROUP BY A.FINAL_VENDOR ORDER BY A.NEO_OD_DAY

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT A.OD_ID , A.OD_QTY_ID , A.PKG_PO_NO , A.DEMAND_ID , A.TOOL_NAME , A.LG_PART_NO , COALESCE(A.LG_OD_QTY,0) AS LG_OD_QTY , A.LINE , A.FINAL_VENDOR , A.CLASS , A.PART_NUMBER , A.DESC , COALESCE(A.RESULT_QTY,0) AS RESULT_QTY , A.NEO_OD_TIME , A.NEO_OD_DAY , COALESCE(A.NEO_OD_QTY,0) AS NEO_OD_QTY , COALESCE(A.QTY_ON_HAND,0) AS QTY_ON_HAND , COALESCE(A.PRE_QTY_ON_HAND,0) AS PRE_QTY_ON_HAND FROM RFID_IF_PACKING_WOSENDLIST_ODONLY A WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.FINAL_VENDOR LIKE concat('%',#{sRqstVendorCd},'%')
AND A.TOOL_NAME LIKE concat('%',#{sRqstItemCd},'%')
AND A.PKG_PO_NO LIKE concat('%',#{sRqstPNoCd},'%')
GROUP BY A.FINAL_VENDOR ORDER BY A.NEO_OD_DAY ) X
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO RFID_C_RECALL ( C_RECALL_ID , DATESELECTED , RECALL_NAME , RECALL_METHOD , M_PRODUCT_ID , DATE_SALE_START , DATE_SALE_END , USE_YN , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID ) VALUES ( #{odId} , DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s')) , NULL , '00' , #{demandId} , NULL , NULL , 'Y' ,COALESCE(#{frstRegistPnttm},DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s')) ,COALESCE(#{frstRegisterId},'SYSTEM') ,COALESCE(#{lastUpdtPnttm},DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s')) ,COALESCE(#{lastUpdusrId},'SYSTEM') )

SELECT get_seq('cRecallLine')
INSERT IGNORE INTO RFID_C_RECALLLINE ( C_RECALLLINE_ID , C_RECALL_ID , DATESHIP , ISRECALL , DATERECALL , USE_YN , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID ) VALUES ( #{cRecallLineId} , #{odId} , NULL , 'Y' , DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s')) , 'Y' ,COALESCE(#{frstRegistPnttm},DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s')) ,COALESCE(#{frstRegisterId},'SYSTEM') ,COALESCE(#{lastUpdtPnttm},DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s')) ,COALESCE(#{lastUpdusrId},'SYSTEM') )
